author: craigmcc
msg: Enhance the <logic:redirect> tag so that it has the same three options for
choosing the destination URL that the <html:link> tag has:
- "forward" attribute, picks context-relative path by logical name
- "page" attribute, specifies context-relative path starting with "/"

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a "page" attribute to the <html:img> tag that can be used, instead of the
"src" attribute, to specify a context-relative path to the image resource to
be rendered.  The tag will automatically prepend the context path of this web

author: craigmcc
msg: Correct the terminology used to refer to the JDBC 2.0 Optional Package Binary.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the bug reporting URL to point at the new Bugzilla installation.
